title: Handle Rejected Port-in Request
description: A port-in request was rejected by the old carrier due to an incorrect account PIN.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and the rejected port-in request, noting the reason 'Incorrect PIN'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the rejected request and the reason code.

tasks.description: Contact the customer, explain the reason for rejection, and ask them to verify the correct PIN with their old carrier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the problem and the required next step for the customer.

tasks.description: Once the customer provides the new PIN, resubmit the port-in request.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully resubmits the request with the updated information.
